mapper.insert: insert into club_meetings(club_no, club_meeting_title, club_meeting_capacity, club_meeting_date, club_meeting_location, club_meeting_dues,club_meeting_address, club_meeting_content) values(#{club_no},#{club_meeting_title},#{club_meeting_capacity},#{club_meeting_date}, #{club_meeting_location},#{club_meeting_dues},#{club_meeting_address}, #{club_meeting_content})
mapper.select: select rp.rental_places_no, rp.member_no, rp.partner_place_no, rp.rental_date, pp.partner_place_name, pp.partner_place_address from rental_places rp join partner_places pp on(rp.partner_place_no = pp.partner_place_no) where member_no = #{member_no}

select rp.rental_places_no, rp.member_no, rp.partner_place_no, rp.rental_date, pp.partner_place_name, pp.partner_place_address from rental_places rp join partner_places pp on(rp.partner_place_no = pp.partner_place_no) where rental_places_no = #{rental_places_no}

select club_meeting_title, club_meeting_location, club_meeting_status, club_meeting_capacity, club_meeting_content, club_meeting_dues, club_meeting_no, club_meeting_address, date_format(club_meeting_date, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') as club_meeting_date from club_meetings where club_meeting_no = #{club_meeting_no}
mapper.update: update club_meetings set club_no = #{vo.club_no}, club_meeting_title = #{vo.club_meeting_title}, club_meeting_capacity = #{vo.club_meeting_capacity}, club_meeting_date = #{vo.club_meeting_date}, club_meeting_location = #{vo.club_meeting_location}, club_meeting_address = #{vo.club_meeting_address}, club_meeting_dues = #{vo.club_meeting_dues} club_meeting_content = #{vo.club_meeting_content} where club_meeting_no = #{vo.club_meeting_no}
mapper.delete: delete from meeting_members where club_no=#{club_no} and club_meeting_no=#{club_meeting_no} and member_no=#{member_no}
mapper.select: select * from meeting_members where club_no=#{club_no} and member_no=#{member_no}
select distinct club_meeting_no as meetingNo, count(member_no) as cntNo from meeting_members where club_no=#{club_no} group by club_meeting_no

select mm.meeting_member_no, mm.club_no, mm.member_no, m.member_name from meeting_members mm join members m on(mm.member_no = m.member_no) where mm.club_meeting_no = #{club_meeting_no} and club_no = #{club_no}
